region.areYouSureThatYouWantToDeleteThisRegion: Are you sure that you want to delete this region?
region.name: Name
region.heading: Heading
region.atLeastOneColumnMustBeAdded: At least one column must be added
region.label: Label
region.atLeastOneColumnConditionMustBeAdded: At least one condition must be added.
region.listOfValuesViewIsMandatory: View for list of values is mandatory.
region.listOfValuesValueIsMandatory: Value for list of values is mandatory.
region.listOfValuesLabelIsMandatory: Label for list of values is mandatory.
region.navigationTypeMustBeMenuBreadcrumbSitema: Navigation type must be either Menu, Breadcrumb or Sitemap.
region.paginationQueryParameterMayConsistOfChar: Pagination query parameter may consists of characters a-z A-Z and _.
region.repeatLastLevelHelpText: When navigation has more levels than defined in template, then use navigation item template with largest level to render navigation items. Otherwise deeper elements are not displayed.
region.preFillFormHelpText: If you want form to be pre filled with data then check it, select view where you get this data and add at least one condition that is used to select correct row from that view. Condition must be url parameter. Eg. if you create link to this page and add '?param_name=param_value' then add param_name to condition input. Then param_value will be used to create query from the view.
region.paginationQueryParameterHelpText: URL parameter that is used for pagination. It may contain characters a-z A-Z and _.
region.columnsHelpText: Report must contain at least one column. Escaped columns do not parse HTML. Sequence must be unique among columns. Link URL may contain special variables &APPLICATION_ROOT& and &APPLICATION_ID&. Link URL and text may contain special variables %column_name% that will be replaced with value of column 'column_name'. For example, if you want to create URL that refers to page 'my_form' in current application and passes on query parameter 'p' with value from column 'id', then you must insert: &APPLICATION_ROOT&/app/&APPLICATION_ID&/my_form?p=%id%
